text: Ba da makaoma so masa ko siran a Miyamaratiyaya a Kapakambayorantang o manga poso iran ko Tadum ko Allah go so Miyakatoron a bunar, ka an siran ndi khabaloi a lagid o siran a piyamugan ko Kitab gowani, na miyakalayat kiran so masa na tomigas so manga poso iran, go madakul kiran a manga Songklid
